name: serverless-mono-example
description: Example repo on how to use yarn workspaces together with the serverless framework.
author: Tom Medema <tommedema@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: yarn run clean-dist && yarn run clean-output && yarn run clean-logs
scripts.clean-incl-deps: yarn run clean && yarn run clean-deps
scripts.clean-deps: rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr packages/*/node_modules && rm -f yarn.lock && rm -fr */**/yarn.lock
